---
title: "qmd-web"

```{r}
library(omni)
```

This is a Quarto website template, made for the [Omni Institute](https://www.omni.org/).

It's based on Omni branding and is intended to be easy to customize using built-in Quarto toolbox.

It contains 3 pages:

- [Home](./index.qmd): the page you're currently in
- [Impact](./impact.qmd): an empty page
- [Use this template](./about.qmd): a short tutorial on how to use and customize the website

## Panel tabset

::: {.panel-tabset}

### First panel

You can include anything you want here, from code to charts.

```{r}
#| echo: true

plot(cars$speed, cars$dist)
```
